title: HR Leave Policy
text: Employees receive 18 paid leaves annually. A maximum of 5 unused leaves can be carried over. Leave applications exceeding 5 consecutive days require manager approval.

title: Expense Reimbursement Rules
text: Employees may claim travel, food, and lodging expenses incurred during official work. Claims must be submitted within 15 days using the company portal.

title: IT Security Guidelines
text: All employees must enable MFA, avoid sharing passwords, update devices regularly, and report phishing attempts to security@company.com.

title: Code of Conduct
text: Employees must maintain professionalism, respect co-workers, and avoid conflicts of interest. Violations may lead to disciplinary action.

title: Internal Communication Policy
text: Teams should use Slack for daily communication and email for official approvals. Sensitive information must not be shared through personal messaging apps.
